name: 100 (itch) (woahitsjeff)
description:
100 for Ludum Dare 48

The planet is on the verge of environmental collapse. Turns out you're the only person fit to stop the inevitable. Venture deeper and deeper into the planet to ensure everyone's survival.

FEATURES

  • Procedurally generated tiles
  • Simple building and crafting
  • Resource management
  • Stats management

CONTROLS

  • 'A' and 'D' to move left/right
  • Hold Q to open the radial menu
  • Left click to select radial menu options
  • Left click to dig
  • 'E' to eat
